content.prompt: Which of the following was a long-term trend that emerged in response to the economic patterns represented in the table?

choices.label: Western European national governments began to institute extensive programs of poor relief to offset the decline in wages.
Western European women began to delay marriage to limit the number of children they would have.
Western European workers began leaving cities and towns to seek better opportunities in the countryside.
Western European farmers began to switch from producing nonfood crops to producing food crops.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
